long: Collections of “long” discourses and other related texts.
medium: Collections of “middle-length” discourses and other related texts.
linked: Collections of “linked” or “connected” discourses and other related texts.
numbered: Collections of “numbered” or “numerical” discourses and other related texts.
minor: Collections of sutta texts outside the four main collections.
other: Texts that are similar to those in the previous five collections, but which are difficult to classify.
